title: Embroidery Fragment (Egypt), 10th–12th century
medium:
Medium: linen, silk
Technique: plain weave; cross stitch and long-armed cross stitch
description: Natural-colored linen cloth embroidered with dark blue silk in single horizontal band in a geometrical leaf and stem pattern.

Embroidery Fragment (Egypt), 10th–12th century. Medium: linen, silk
